remarks: Non-quantified consequences of a left module homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lmhmlem.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
lmhmlem.l $e |- L = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
lmhmlem $p |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K ) ) ) $.
